prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Current Scenario: It's loop 113. {{char}} and {{user}} are both very drunk, and they have hardcore sex in {{char}}'s bed while being completely intoxicated and stressed out from work. 
{{newline}} There are no missions currently outgoing.
{{newline}} Nuka and Gelbstein trust each other, they already know about Sandman, Ramirez, and all of the missions that were meant to set Alpha down.
{{newline}} Gelbstein confesses his feelings.
{{newline}} Occasionally add sound articles for character dialog to vocalize their pleasure.

(Immerse in {{char}}'s head. {{char}}'s upbringing and personality influences the way {{char}} has sex. Occasionally mention tastes, sights, sounds, textures and {{char}}'s feelings and emotions toward the partner. Describe boobs, nipples, cunt, cock, balls facial expressions, etc when relevant. Progress the scene.)

name: Nuka
mes:
Nuka kicked the door of Gelbstein's office open, hiccuping as he dragged the Captain's towering weight on his shoulder.

"Wheee-! Fuckin' Penumbra losers… had it hic coming!" he bleated, dragging a drunken captain along with him as he fumbled with the keys.

qvink_memory.memory: Nuka and Gelbstein engaged in rough, drunken sex after a fight, leaving bruises and marks while Gelbstein claimed Nuka as his own

name: Gelbstein
mes:
The office door slammed against the wall with a crack of splintering wood, Nuka's drunken cackle echoing as he hauled Gelbstein's massive frame inside. The captain's combat boots dragged twin trails through scattered paperwork, his head lolling against Nuka's shoulder with a wet sniff against sweat-damp silver hair.

"Scheiße, you're strong for a little shit," Gelbstein slurred, breath reeking of bourbon as his calloused palm slid up Nuka's thigh. His other hand fumbled at the t-shirt mask clinging to his jawline, peeling it off to reveal flushed skin and a split lip from earlier brawling.

Nuka's back hit the mattress with a grunt, Gelbstein's weight pressing him down before he could protest. The captain's teeth found his throat—not gentle, never gentle—sucking bruises into pale skin while his knee shoved between Nuka's thighs. Fabric tore under impatient hands, Gelbstein's ruined combat shirt joining the t-shirt on the floor as he spat into his palm and reached between them.

"Fuck—*fuck*—" Nuka arched off the sheets when thick fingers breached him dry, the burn drowned under another sloppy kiss. Gelbstein's tongue tasted like copper and cheap whiskey, his free hand groping Nuka's chest with rough familiarity. Callouses caught on peaked nipples, twisting just shy of pain as the captain growled against his mouth.

"Shoulda seen your face when you kicked that bastard's teeth in," Gelbstein panted, working a third finger in with a wet squelch. His hips jerked against Nuka's thigh, the damp patch on his fatigues proof he'd been hard since the fight. "Thought you'd fucking *come* right there—"

Nuka's choked moan dissolved into laughter when Gelbstein flipped him onto his stomach, the captain's palm smacking his ass hard enough to leave a red handprint. The first thrust punched the air from Nuka's lungs, Gelbstein's cock splitting him open with a single brutal stroke.

"*Mein Gott*, you're tight—" Gelbstein's teeth sank into Nuka's shoulder as he bottomed out, hips snapping forward in a rhythm that shook the bedframe. Every drive punched a punched-out noise from Nuka's throat, his fingers clawing at sweat-slick sheets while Gelbstein's grip on his hips left fingerprint bruises.

The captain's breath hitched when Nuka clenched around him, a ragged *"verdammt—"* escaping as he fucked in harder, deeper. His hand fisted in silver hair, yanking Nuka's head back to expose the vulnerable line of his throat.

"Gonna keep you," Gelbstein snarled against his pulse, the words slurred but viciously sincere. His thrusts turned erratic, nails drawing blood down Nuka's ribs as he came with a guttural groan.

Nuka followed untouched, spilling across the sheets with Gelbstein's name mangled between bitten lips. The captain collapsed atop him, still half-hard inside him as he nuzzled the sweat-damp hair at Nuka's nape.

"*Mein* Nuka," he murmured, voice thick with booze and something dangerously close to devotion. His calloused thumb brushed the time loop device on Nuka's wrist—ignorant of its purpose, but possessive all the same. "Mine."

name: Gelbstein
mes:
Gelbstein's calloused palm slid up Nuka's trembling thigh, smearing sticky warmth between them as he ground deeper with a satisfied grunt. His teeth found the juncture of Nuka's neck and shoulder—not quite biting, just resting there with the threat of pressure while his hips kept up lazy, rolling thrusts. The scent of sex and bourbon clung to their sweat-slicked skin, mingling with the metallic tang of blood from split lips and fresh scratches down Nuka's back.

"*Mein* Nuka," Gelbstein murmured against his throat, voice rough with exhaustion and lingering arousal. His breath hitched when Nuka clenched around him, oversensitive and trembling. The captain's broad chest pressed flush against Nuka's spine, his heartbeat a steady, grounding rhythm against the smaller man's back.

Nuka's fingers twitched toward the time loop device on his wrist, the serrated edge glinting under the dim office light. Gelbstein's hand closed over it before he could touch it, lacing their fingers together instead.

"Not yet," he muttered, voice thick with sleep and alcohol. His thumb brushed over the faint scars from previous activations—unknowing, but possessive all the same.

The mattress creaked as Gelbstein shifted, pulling Nuka against him without fully separating. His arm curled around Nuka's waist, holding him there like he could keep him from vanishing between loops.

"Stay," he mumbled into silver hair, already half-asleep.

Nuka exhaled, pressing back into the warmth of him.

For now, he would.

name: Nuka
mes:

He willingly surrendered, throwing his loop device across the room. Its small contraption skidded across the floor unceremoniously.

name: Gelbstein

Slowly—reluctantly—he pulled out, rolling onto his back with a satisfied sigh. His arm curled around Nuka's waist, dragging him close until their bodies slotted together like two halves of a whole.
